film condensed: 1967 - height of cold war.
Russian spy Abel paints in a studio, gets a call.
reality condensed: Abel set himself up as an artist in Brooklyn.

film condensed: Leaves his studio, tailed by the FBI.
Sits painting by the riverside.
Covertly removes a coin from underneath a bench.
reality condensed: A hollow nickel was a key piece of evidence.

film condensed: Goes home, pries coin open - there's a note inside.
reality condensed: Tiny notes showing groups of numbers were found.

film condensed: The FBI burst in. Abel destroys the note.
reality condensed: Abel was naked when they arrested him in his hotel.

film condensed: Insurance lawyer Donovan discusses a claim with fellow lawyer.
Returns to his office, his name on the door.
reality condensed: Donovan was a partner in Watters & Donovan law firm.

film condensed: Watters asks him to take Abel's case. He agrees.
reality condensed: The bar recommended Donovan take the case.

film condensed: Donovan asks his associate, Forrester, to help.
Donovan argues with wife Mary about the case.
reality condensed: Mary wasn't happy about the case.

film condensed: He visits Abel, who accepts his representation.
Captain Powers undergoes CIA recruitment protocol.
Agent Williams recruits Powers & others.
Donovan requests a trial extension, Judge Byers refuses.
Agent Hoffman accosts Donovan in the street.
Hoffman asks Donovan for info on Abel. He refuses.
Powers is shown the U-2 spy plane he'll be flying.
reality condensed: The U-2 mission was based at Peshawar.

film condensed: Donovan views evidence against Abel. There was no search warrant.
Byers denies Donovan's motion to throw out illegally-obtained evidence.
Abel asks Donovan how the case is going.
A classroom of kids are shown an atomic attack infofilm.
reality condensed: Kids were shown civil defence advice films.

film condensed: Donovan's son Roger is concerned about everything.
reality condensed: True, but for Spielberg, not Donovan.

film condensed: Donovan gets glared at on the subway.
Abel is found guilty on all counts.
Abel & Donovan talk. They like each other.
Donovan visits Byers at home, asks that Abel live.
reality condensed: Donovan presented this argument in open court.

film condensed: Byers sentences Abel to 30 years.
Donovan tells journalists he'll be appealing.
People have thrown glass into Donovan's office in protest.
Donovan & Abel listen to music in custody.
reality condensed: Donovan visited Abel often, discussed everything.

film condensed: Shots are fired into Donovan's home.
The police arrive, an officer yells at Donovan.
CIA recruits are told to kill themselves in the event of capture.
reality condensed: Spies were given a poisoned needle in a hollow silver dollar.

film condensed: Donovan heads to the Supreme Court.
reality condensed: Donovan took Abel's case to The Supreme Court.

film condensed: The CIA spies head out on their mission.
reality condensed: The CIA sent a plane to photograph Soviet territory.

film condensed: Donovan gives a speech to the Supreme Court.
reality condensed: Donovan took Abel's case to The Supreme Court.

film condensed: CIA spies conduct pre-flight checks, Powers is piloting.
Donovan continues his speech.
reality condensed: Donovan took Abel's case to The Supreme Court.

film condensed: Powers takes off.
reality condensed: Powers flew the U-2 from Peshawar.

film condensed: Donovan's speech has everyone listening.
reality condensed: Donovan took Abel's case to The Supreme Court.

film condensed: The U-2 is shot down. Powers opens his parachute.
Abel hears his conviction was upheld by 5 to 4.
reality condensed: The court affirmed the verdict by a vote of 5 to 4.

film condensed: Mary hears the same news.
reality condensed: The family were relieved when it was over.

film condensed: Donovan gets a letter from East Germany in with his usual hatemail.
reality condensed: Donovan got hatemail, & letters from Germany.

film condensed: The letter is from someone posing as Abel's wife.
reality condensed: Donovan received letters from Abel's fake wife.

film condensed: Powers gets 10 years from the Russian govt.
CIA director Dulles asks Donovan to negotiate a prisoner exchange.
reality condensed: Donovan was asked to negotiate a prisoner exchange.

film condensed: Berlin - the wall is going up. Pryor, a student, slips through a gap.
reality condensed: Pryor wasn't in Berlin when the wall was under construction.

film condensed: Pryor finds his girlfriend, implores her to leave with him.
reality condensed: Pryor didn't have a girlfriend in Berlin.

film condensed: They get trapped, the police arrest Pryor.
Donovan packs to leave, his wife is scared.
reality condensed: Donovan didn't tell his wife the truth.

film condensed: Berlin - Donovan told he will be working alone.
Hoffman warns Donovan of the dangers in East Berlin.
reality condensed: Donovan stayed in an apartment, briefed by 'Bob'.

film condensed: Pryor's girlfriend tries to visit him in jail.
reality condensed: Pryor didn't have a girlfriend in Berlin.

film condensed: Donovan persuades guards to let him skip a checkpoint line.
A gang of boys steal Donovan's coat.
Donovan meets Abel's 'family' at the Russian Embassy.
Donovan negotiates with Soviet Secretary Schischkin.
Lawyer Vogel agrees to exchange Pryor for Abel.
Donovan briefs Hoffman on his progress.
Powers interrogated by the Soviets.
Agents wake Abel in his cell.
reality condensed: Abel was brought to Berlin for the exchange.

film condensed: Moscow agrees to the exchange of Abel for Powers.
Vogel is now refusing the exchange of Abel for Pryor.
reality condensed: The DDR had issues with the double trade.

film condensed: The police pull Vogel & Donovan over.
The police take Donovan away, citing passport problems.
Donovan spends the night in jail.
reality condensed: Donovan didn't spend any time in jail.

film condensed: From the train he sees would-be escapees getting shot.
Hoffman tells him the Germans called. Donovan rushes off.
Donovan meets East German AG Ott, who offers him Pryor only.
Donovan tells Ott's assistant to pass on a tough message.
Donovan's insistence on saving both Pryor & Powers makes Hoffman mad.
Donovan calls Mary, says he's in London.
The exchange is confirmed. Powers at Glienicke Bridge, Pryor at Checkpoint Charlie.
reality condensed: The complicated exchange was confirmed by phone.

film condensed: Donovan's party waits at Glienicke Bridge.
reality condensed: The exchange happened at Glienicke Bridge.

film condensed: They call Checkpoint Charlie to see if Pryor is there.
reality condensed: The guards phoned for updated from Checkpoint Charlie.

film condensed: The other side arrive. Donovan sticks by Abel.
reality condensed: Donovan saw Abel off across the bridge.

film condensed: Donovan insists they wait for confirmation of Pryor's arrival.
reality condensed: They waited for Pryor to get to Checkpoint Charlie.

film condensed: Pryor arrives at Checkpoint Charlie.
reality condensed: Pryor was released at Checkpoint Charlie.

film condensed: Abel tells Donovan he's sent him a painting.
reality condensed: Donovan watched the exchange. Abel gave him a painting.

film condensed: Powers tries to thank people, nobody listens.
Donovan unwraps the painting, it's a portrait of him.
Donovan arrives home, his wife asks for her marmalade.
Donovan's family hear what he's been up to when it hits the news.
Mary finds Donovan fast asleep, she's proud.
Donovan on the subway, now respected by strangers.
Abel reunited with his real family.
reality condensed: Abel went back to his family.

film condensed: Powers died in a crash, awarded posthumous accolades.
reality condensed: Powers got bravery awards, died in helicopter crash.

film condensed: Pryor became Professor Emeritus at Swarthmore College.
Donovan sent to Cuba to negotiate for prisoners.
reality condensed: Donovan negotiated for Bay of Pigs prisoners.
